spirit:field.spirit:description: Environment Information - See tech register spreadsheet for details

spirit:field.spirit:description: FPGA Platform Support - See tech register spreadsheet for details

spirit:field.spirit:description: FPGA Base Platform - See tech register spreadsheet for details

spirit:field.spirit:description: FPGA Image Type - See tech register spreadsheet for details

spirit:field.spirit:name: part_number
spirit:field.spirit:description: Part Number - See tech register spreadsheet for details

spirit:field.spirit:name: vendor
spirit:field.spirit:description: Vendor Information - See tech register spreadsheet for details

spirit:field.spirit:name: technology
spirit:field.spirit:description: Technology - See tech register spreadsheet for details

spirit:field.spirit:name: rxaui_l0_t1
spirit:field.spirit:description: RXAUI with lane 0 mapped to transceiver 1 present

spirit:field.spirit:name: rxaui_l0_t0
spirit:field.spirit:description: RXAUI with lane 0 mapped to transceiver 0 present

spirit:field.spirit:name: link_gt_common_pll0reset
spirit:field.spirit:description: Link GTPE2 COMMON PLL0RESET (Active-High) (See UG482, Table 2-8)

spirit:field.spirit:name: xmii_tx_clk_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: XMII TX CLK Select: 0 : GMII Reference Clock 1 : TX_CLK

spirit:field.spirit:name: link_gt_common_pll0refclklost
spirit:field.spirit:description: Link GTPE2 COMMON PLL0REFCLKLOST (Active-High) (See UG482, Table 2-8)

spirit:field.spirit:name: link_gt_common_pll0lock
spirit:field.spirit:description: Link GTPE2 COMMON PLL0LOCK (Active-High) (See UG482, Table 2-8)

spirit:field.spirit:name: count
spirit:field.spirit:description: Count value used for frequency calculation: if (ref_clk_faster) freq_min(det_clk) = freq(ref_clk)*((count+2)/(max_count+1)) freq_max(det_clk) = freq(ref_clk)*((count+4)/(max_count-1)) else freq_min(det_clk) = freq(ref_clk)*((max_count+2)/(count+1)) freq_max(det_clk) = freq(ref_clk)*((max_count+4)/(count-1))

spirit:field.spirit:name: ref_clk_faster
spirit:field.spirit:description: This field determines if the reference clock (CPU Clock) is faster than the measured clock (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: max_count
spirit:field.spirit:description: This is the value used for the i_counter_max port of the freq_det module.

spirit:field.spirit:name: clk_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: This field determines which clock is going to be measured: 0 : XMII RX Clock 1 : GE CLM RX Clock 2-7 : Reserved

spirit:field.spirit:name: go
spirit:field.spirit:description: Write a 1 to initiate frequency detection. HW will clear this field upon completion. Once cleared the frequency calculation can be done.

spirit:field.spirit:name: count
spirit:field.spirit:description: Count value used for frequency calculation: if (ref_clk_faster) freq_min(det_clk) = freq(ref_clk)*((count+2)/(max_count+1)) freq_max(det_clk) = freq(ref_clk)*((count+4)/(max_count-1)) else freq_min(det_clk) = freq(ref_clk)*((max_count+2)/(count+1)) freq_max(det_clk) = freq(ref_clk)*((max_count+4)/(count-1))

spirit:field.spirit:name: ref_clk_faster
spirit:field.spirit:description: This field determines if the reference clock (CPU Clock) is faster than the measured clock (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: max_count
spirit:field.spirit:description: This is the value used for the i_counter_max port of the freq_det module.

spirit:field.spirit:name: clk_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: This field determines which clock is going to be measured: 0 : DP GTREFCLK1 (TX Reference Clock) 1 : DP GTREFCLK0 (RX Recovered Clock) 2-7 : Reserved

spirit:field.spirit:name: go
spirit:field.spirit:description: Write a 1 to initiate frequency detection. HW will clear this field upon completion. Once cleared the frequency calculation can be done.

spirit:field.spirit:name: auto_enable
spirit:field.spirit:description: Automatic Mode Enable: 0 : Manual Mode 1 : Automatic Mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: comp_ref_clk_faster
spirit:field.spirit:description: In automatic mode the freq_det_dp.ref_clk_faster gets compared with this value

spirit:field.spirit:name: comp_count_max
spirit:field.spirit:description: In automatic mode the freq_det_dp.count gets compared with this value

spirit:field.spirit:name: comp_count_min
spirit:field.spirit:description: In automatic mode the freq_det_dp.count gets compared with this value

spirit:register.spirit:name: enable
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Enable register - Write 1 to enable, 0 to mask an interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: freq_det_dp_oor
spirit:field.spirit:description: Frequency Detect DP Out Of Range

spirit:field.spirit:name: rxaui_gt1_rx_buf_overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: RXAUI GT1 RX Elastic Buffer Overflow (RXBUFSTATUS was 3'b110)

spirit:field.spirit:name: rxaui_gt1_rx_buf_underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: RXAUI GT1 RX Elastic Buffer Underflow (RXBUFSTATUS was 3'b101)

spirit:field.spirit:description: RXAUI GT0 RX Elastic Buffer Overflow (RXBUFSTATUS was 3'b110)

spirit:field.spirit:name: rxaui_gt0_rx_buf_underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: RXAUI GT0 RX Elastic Buffer Underflow (RXBUFSTATUS was 3'b101)

spirit:field.spirit:name: sl_5g_rx_buf_overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: SL 5G RX Elastic Buffer Overflow (RXBUFSTATUS was 3'b110)

spirit:field.spirit:name: sl_5g_rx_buf_underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: SL 5G RX Elastic Buffer Underflow (RXBUFSTATUS was 3'b101)

spirit:field.spirit:description: SL 5G RX FSM Reset Done Interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: sl_5g_tx_fsm_reset_done
spirit:field.spirit:description: SL 5G TX FSM Reset Done Interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: ulp_phy_clk_lock
spirit:field.spirit:description: ULP PHY Clock PLL Lock Interrupt

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending
spirit:register.spirit:description: Pending register - This indicates which events are pending, Write 1 to clear

spirit:field.spirit:name: freq_det_dp_oor
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Frequency Detect DP Out Of Range

spirit:field.spirit:name: rxaui_gt1_rx_buf_overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High RXAUI GT1 RX Elastic Buffer Overflow

spirit:field.spirit:name: rxaui_gt1_rx_buf_underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High RXAUI GT1 RX Elastic Buffer Underflow

spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High SL 5G RX Elastic Buffer Overflow

spirit:field.spirit:name: sl_5g_rx_buf_underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High SL 5G RX Elastic Buffer Underflow

spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Rising and Falling Edge SL 5G RX FSM Reset Done

spirit:field.spirit:name: sl_5g_tx_fsm_reset_done
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High SL 5G TX FSM Reset Done

spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Rising and Falling Edge RXAUI Align Status

spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active High XADC VCCINT Sensor Alarm

spirit:field.spirit:name: sfp_los

spirit:register.spirit:name: raw
spirit:register.spirit:description: This register contains the registered state of interrupt signals

spirit:field.spirit:name: freq_det_dp_oor
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the Frequency Detect DP Out Of Range (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: rxaui_gt1_rx_buf_overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the RXAUI GT1 RX Elastic Buffer Overflow (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: rxaui_gt1_rx_buf_underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the RXAUI GT1 RX Elastic Buffer Underflow (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: rxaui_gt0_rx_buf_overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the RXAUI GT0 RX Elastic Buffer Overflow (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: rxaui_gt0_rx_buf_underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the RXAUI GT0 RX Elastic Buffer Underflow (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: sl_5g_rx_buf_overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the SL 5G RX Elastic Buffer Overflow (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: sl_5g_rx_buf_underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the SL 5G RX Elastic Buffer Underflow (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: sl_5g_rx_fsm_reset_done
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the SL 5G RX FSM Reset Done (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: sl_5g_tx_fsm_reset_done
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the SL 5G TX FSM Reset Done (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: rxaui_align_status
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the RXAUI Align Status (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: ulp_phy_clk_lock
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the ULP PHY Clock PLL Lock (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: xadc_ot
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the XADC Over-Temperature Alarm (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: xadc_vbram
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the XADC VBRAM Sensor Alarm (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: xadc_vccaux
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the XADC VCCAUX Sensor Alarm (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: xadc_vccint
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the XADC VCCINT Sensor Alarm (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: xadc_user_temp
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the XADC Temperature Sensor Alarm (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: usb_vbus_detect
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the USB VBUS Detect (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: mdio_int_b
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the MDIO Interrupt (Active-Low)

spirit:field.spirit:name: sfp_los
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the SFP+ Module Connector LOS (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: master_bus_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: MDIO Master Bus Select 0 : Mother board (connector) 1 : RXAUI Core (internal)

spirit:field.spirit:name: master_bus_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: I2C Master Bus Select 0 : Core board (local) 1 : Mother board (connector)

spirit:field.spirit:name: ge_uart_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: GE UART Select 0 : Mother board (connector) 1 : GE UART (internal)

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_disable
spirit:field.spirit:description: Transmitter Disable 0 : Module transmitter enabled 1 : Module transmitter disabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: rs1
spirit:field.spirit:description: Rate Select TX 0 : TX signalling rate less than or equal to 4.25 GBd 1 : TX signalling rate greater than 4.25 GBd

spirit:field.spirit:name: rs0
spirit:field.spirit:description: Rate Select RX 0 : RX signalling rate less than or equal to 4.25 GBd 1 : RX signalling rate greater than 4.25 GBd

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_los
spirit:field.spirit:description: RX LOS (Active-High) - Indicates an optical signal level below that specified in the relevant standard

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_fault
spirit:field.spirit:description: TX Fault (Active-High) - Module transmitter detected a fault

spirit:field.spirit:name: mod_abs
spirit:field.spirit:description: Module Absent (Active-High) - SFP+ module is physically absent

spirit:field.spirit:name: force_tx_elec_idle
spirit:field.spirit:description: When this is set to 1, it forces the FPGA PIPE TX to Electrical Idle. Only used for hardware test to isolate the PIPE RX path from cross talk of TX path.

spirit:field.spirit:name: strapping_done
spirit:field.spirit:description: This register is used for dynamic strapping to select the proper path for strap options: xtal_dis and ssc_dis. Assert high when strapping is completed (This should be asserted after PHY is out of reset using rst_b). See also "out_enable"

spirit:field.spirit:name: xtal_dis
spirit:field.spirit:description: Strap Option - Selects an input clock source 0 : Crystal input 1 : Clock input

spirit:field.spirit:name: ssc_dis
spirit:field.spirit:description: Strap Option - Spread spectrum clocking disable 0 : SSC enable 1 : SSC disable

spirit:field.spirit:name: power_present_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: Power Present Select for the ULP: 0 : VBUS Detect 1 : usb3phy_ctrl.power_present register field

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_enable
spirit:field.spirit:description: Assert high to enable PHY outputs. Assert after PHY is out of reset and when dynamic strapping is complete. See rst_b and strapping_done.

spirit:field.spirit:name: boot_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: Boot Select 0 : Program Mode 1 : Boot from Flash

spirit:register.spirit:name: drp_ctrl
spirit:register.spirit:description: DRP Control and Write Data. Note: make sure this register is setup before writing to the drp_en_mask register

spirit:register.spirit:name: drp_en_mask
spirit:register.spirit:description: DRP Enable Mask for each DRP bus. - A write to this register initiates a transaction to each enabled DRP bus. - A field gets cleared when its respective DRP bus asserts DRPRDY. Note: before attempting a new transaction, make sure no DRP bus is busy (all fields should be cleared) Note: always enable exactly 1 DRP bus for read transfers, write transfers can have any combination of DRP buses enabled Note: following a read transaction make sure the DRP bus has asserted DRPRDY (its DRP Enable Mask field should be cleared) before reading the drp_read_data register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: sl_5g_gt0
spirit:field.spirit:description: DRP Enable Mask for SL 5G GT0

spirit:field.spirit:name: rxaui_gt1
spirit:field.spirit:description: DRP Enable Mask for RXAUI GT1

spirit:field.spirit:name: rxaui_gt0
spirit:field.spirit:description: DRP Enable Mask for RXAUI GT0

spirit:field.spirit:name: link_mmcm
spirit:field.spirit:description: DRP Enable Mask for Link MMCM

spirit:field.spirit:name: link_gt_common
spirit:field.spirit:description: DRP Enable Mask for Link GT COMMON

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_gt_rxoutclk_mmcm
spirit:field.spirit:description: DRP Enable Mask for DP GT RXOUTCLK MMCM

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_gt_txoutclk_mmcm
spirit:field.spirit:description: DRP Enable Mask for DP GT TXOUTCLK MMCM

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_gt_common
spirit:field.spirit:description: DRP Enable Mask for DP GT COMMON

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_gt3
spirit:field.spirit:description: DRP Enable Mask for DP GT3

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_gt2
spirit:field.spirit:description: DRP Enable Mask for DP GT2

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_gt1
spirit:field.spirit:description: DRP Enable Mask for DP GT1

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_gt0
spirit:field.spirit:description: DRP Enable Mask for DP GT0

spirit:register.spirit:name: drp_read_data
spirit:register.spirit:description: DRP Read Data Note: make sure the DRP bus has asserted DRPRDY (its DRP Enable Mask field in the drp_en_mask register should be cleared) before reading this register

spirit:field.spirit:name: soft_reset_tx
spirit:field.spirit:description: Soft Reset of TX path of all DP GTPs (Active-High) 1'b0 - All GTP TX Reset FSMs are out of reset 1'b1 - All GTP TX Reset FSMs are in reset Note: To reset write a 1 followed by a 0

spirit:field.spirit:name: dont_reset_on_data_error
spirit:field.spirit:description: Do not automatically reset the RX_STARTUP_FSM of a GTP when its DATA_VALID input de-asserts.

spirit:field.spirit:name: soft_reset_rx
spirit:field.spirit:description: Soft Reset of RX path of all DP GTPs (Active-High) 1'b0 - All GTP RX Reset FSMs are out of reset 1'b1 - All GTP RX Reset FSMs are in reset Note: To reset write a 1 followed by a 0

spirit:register.spirit:name: rx_ph_slip_monitor
spirit:register.spirit:description: GTP RX Phase Alignment Slip Monitor

spirit:field.spirit:name: gt_data_valid_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: DATA_VALID input to the GT RX_STARTUP_FSM is: 1'b0 : always 1 1'b1 : hardware defined (generally the NOT of the OR of all 8B/10B decode errors)

spirit:field.spirit:name: fix_missing_start
spirit:field.spirit:description: Replace the XGMII Idle with an XGMII Start control character when it is detected missing (see stats0.missing_start)

spirit:field.spirit:name: debug
spirit:field.spirit:description: Debug Port (See PG083, Table 2-18) [0] : TX Phase Align Complete [4:1] : Sync Status [5]: Align Status

spirit:field.spirit:name: gtrxreset
spirit:field.spirit:description: GT0 and GT1 GTRXRESET (Active-High) (See UG482, Table 2-18)

spirit:registerFile.spirit:name: stats0
spirit:registerFile.spirit:description: All the statistic registers and their configuration.

spirit:register.spirit:name: rd2clr_config
spirit:register.spirit:description: Configures if the stats register read by s/w clears the read register. A 1 in any bit configures the h/w to clear the corresponding stats register after a s/w read of that stats register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: missing_start
spirit:field.spirit:description: Detected an XGMII Idle instead of an XGMII Start control character

spirit:field.spirit:name: dont_reset_on_data_error
spirit:field.spirit:description: Do not automatically reset the RX_STARTUP_FSM of the GTP when DATA_VALID input de-asserts.

spirit:field.spirit:name: soft_reset_rx
spirit:field.spirit:description: Soft Reset of RX path of the GTP (Active-High) 1'b0 - GTP RX Reset FSM is out of reset 1'b1 - GTP RX Reset FSM is in reset Note: To reset write a 1 followed by a 0

spirit:field.spirit:name: soft_reset_tx
spirit:field.spirit:description: Soft Reset of TX path of the GTP (Active-High) 1'b0 - GTP X Reset FSM is out of reset 1'b1 - GTP TX Reset FSM is in reset Note: To reset write a 1 followed by a 0

spirit:field.spirit:name: data_valid_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: DATA_VALID input to the GT RX_STARTUP_FSM is: 1'b0 : always 1 1'b1 : hardware defined (generally the NOT of the OR of all 8B/10B decode errors)

spirit:registerFile.spirit:name: stats0
spirit:registerFile.spirit:description: All the statistic registers and their configuration.

spirit:register.spirit:name: rd2clr_config
spirit:register.spirit:description: Configures if the stats register read by s/w clears the read register. A 1 in any bit configures the h/w to clear the corresponding stats register after a s/w read of that stats register.

variant.name: none
variant.doc: 'none' variant states including all templates which are not assigned any variant property.
